00034 /* A few constants for an attempt at semi-uniformity */
00035 #define PREFS_FONT_SIZE     8
00036 
00037 /* these are spacing guidelines: ie. radio buttons should have a 5 pixel
00038  * border on each side */
00039 #define RADIO_BUTTON_BORDER    5
00040 #define TOP_LEVEL_BORDER       5
00041 #define GENERIC_CONTROL_BORDER 5
00042 
00043 class PrefsPanel:public wxPanel 
00044 {
00045  public:
00046    PrefsPanel(wxWindow * parent, wxString title)
00047    :  wxPanel(parent, wxID_ANY)
00048    {
00049       SetLabel(title);     // Provide visual label
00050       SetName(title);      // Provide audible label
00051    }
00052    
00053    virtual ~PrefsPanel()
00054    {
00055    }
00056 
00057    virtual bool Apply() = 0;
00058 
00059    virtual void Cancel()
00060    {
00061    }
00062 };
